Class VizzlyServletContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.vizzly.VizzlyServletContextListener

  • public class VizzlyServletContextListener
extends java.lang.Object
    This class takes care of background cache updater threads and the initialization of state that must be persisted during the lifetime of the servlet
    Author:
    Matthias Keller
